item.description:
Come on out and check out Frank Santos The R-Rated Hypnotist.

Be amazed when you, your friends or strangers across the room become stars of the show, as Frank makes them believe that they are singers, dancers and much, much more. This is a performance where the audience becomes the show. His performance has limitless variations and can please every appetite. This is a hilarious, energetic and unique show that you will never forget!

We have seen Franks show's a few times (every show is different) and have always enjoyed ourselves so come on out and join us as Frank ads a little more laughter to your day!

Information about getting your ticket:

Table #'s that we will be sitting at will be table #'s 59, 60 and 53. Note they are not reserved for our group, they are only suggestions that we sit at those table(s) and be prepared that if you don't order your ticket quick enough other people may be sitting at the table with you.

To reserve your ticket/seat go to http://www.northshorepavilion.com/blue-ocean-music-hall-home.html

Remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can give your dues to either Donna or Janet at any event.  Thank you!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  

We look forward to seeing you,

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside at the table.
item.name: The R-Rated Hypnotist
